articles.description: Many U.S. workers will now have to use vacation days to get paid if they are exposed to COVID-19 and cannot work.
articles.content:
BATON ROUGE, La. (WAFB) - Millions of American workers will now have to use vacation days to get paid if they are exposed to COVID-19 and cannot work during quarantine.
A bill requiring employers to… [+830 chars]

articles.description: The star defender steps up again just a few years after his historic Hurricane Harvey fundraising
articles.content:
HOUSTON - J.J. Watt is a legend in Houston for his on-the-field endeavors for the Texans, but he is also one of the most charitable.

articles.title: Pinellas, Hillsborough, Hernando stop taking vaccination reservations. Pasco website still up. - Tampa Bay Times
articles.description: Both Pinellas and Hillsborough were taking appointments by phone earlier in the day.

articles.title: How Haven's high hopes of redefining health care came to a crashing halt - STAT
